programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. Drama, starring Michael Caine and Glenda Jackson in her final film Oliver Parker - Director Michael Caine - Bernie Jordan Glenda Jackson - Rene Jordan John Standing - Arthur Howard-Johnson Danielle Vitalis - Adele Victor Oshin - Scott Selwood Will Fletcher - Young Bernie.

programme.title: There's Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Festive horror comedy starring Martin Starr and Amrita Acharia. After inheriting a house in the mountains of Norway, an American family ups sticks from California and relocates. However, their decision to convert the property's old barn into an Airbnb unwittingly disturbs the creature that lives there - and hell hath no fury like an angry barn elf Magnus Martens - Director Martin Starr - Bill Amrita Acharia - Carol Kiran Shah - Main elf Townes Bunner - Lucas Zoe Winther-Hansen - Nora Henriette Steenstrup - Liv.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Biopic
programme.desc: When life inspires film, the most incredible stories are told. Join us as we journey through some of our favourite biopics, from Sky Original film Lee to Goodfellas and Back to Black.

programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Justice Smith and David Alan Grier. Genial artist Aren, who is African-American, is struggling to make sense of his place in the world until he's invited to join a secret society dedicated to enhancing the lives of white people. However, Aren's debut mission tests his loyalty when he and his first assignment fall for the same person Kobi Libii - Director Justice Smith - Aren David Alan Grier - Roger An-Li Bogan - Lizzie Drew Tarver - Jason Munt Aisha Hinds - Gabbard.

programme.title: Jericho Ridge
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Nikki Amuka-Bird. Injured police deputy Tabby Temple returns to work after a period of leave to discover that the station has been broken into and weaponry stolen. Her colleagues leave her to work dispatch for the night, but with a pair of local criminals still sniffing around the station, Tabby soon finds herself at the centre of a siege that steadily escalates Will Gilbey - Director Nikki Amuka-Bird - Deputy Tabby Temple Zack Morris - Monty Temple Simon Kunz - Sheriff Eddie Reynolds Michael Socha - Earl Macready Philipp Christopher - Carter.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.sub-title: Romance, Drama, Music, Musical, Arts And Culture ║ 2018 ║ 15
programme.desc: Musical romantic drama starring Lady Gaga and Bradley Cooper. Rock star Jackson Maine meets aspiring songwriter Ally, a waitress who moonlights as a bar singer. programme.desc: Superhero action adventure starring Dakota Johnson. While on a dangerous job, New York paramedic Cassie Webb has a near-fatal accident and develops precognitive powers. programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: Horror thriller starring Emily Blunt and John Krasinski. After blind insectoid monsters with super-sensitive hearing wipe out most of humanity, a family of survivors adapts to living in silence. But with a new baby on the way, their noiseless way of life is about to become a lot more difficult.. programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror prequel starring Lupita Nyong'o and Joseph Quinn. New York City is suddenly attacked by terrifying alien creatures with super-sensitive hearing. programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. He hopes that the backyard swimming pool will be fun for the kids and provide physical therapy for himself. However, a dark secret from the home's past soon unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror. Writer/director Bryce McGuire's horror, starring Wyatt Russell and Kerry Condon Bryce McGuire - Director Wyatt Russell - Ray Waller Kerry Condon - Eve Waller Amélie Hoeferle - Izzy Waller Gavin Warren - Elliot Waller Nancy Lenehan - Kay.

programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. In an attempt to bring down this mighty duo, the assassin Mathayus is hired to kill Cassandra and thereafter become king of the last free tribes.n Chuck Russell - Director Dwayne Johnson - Mathayus, the Scorpion King Michael Clarke Duncan - Balthazar Steven Brand - Memnon Kelly Hu - Cassandra Bernard Hill - Philos Grant Heslov - Arpid Peter Facinelli - Prince Takmet Ralf Moeller - Thorak Sherri Howard - Queen Isis Roger Rees - King Pheron.

programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Justice Smith and David Alan Grier. Genial artist Aren, who is African-American, is struggling to make sense of his place in the world until he's invited to join a secret society dedicated to enhancing the lives of white people. However, Aren's debut mission tests his loyalty when he and his first assignment fall for the same person Kobi Libii - Director Justice Smith - Aren David Alan Grier - Roger An-Li Bogan - Lizzie Drew Tarver - Jason Munt Aisha Hinds - Gabbard.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: Franklin, a blogger, scuppers an attack against tech guru Anton Burrell, and finds a ring that the pioneering genius dropped. The device gives its wearer the ability to travel 57 seconds into the past, so Franklin decides to use it to take revenge against the pharmaceutical company responsible for his sister's death. Thriller, starring Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman Rusty Cundieff - Director Josh Hutcherson - Franklin Fox Morgan Freeman - Anton Burrell Greg Germann - Sig Thorenson Lovie Simone - Jala Bevin Bru - Renee Renzler Sammi Rotibi - Calvert.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: While visiting an island for her husband's work, a woman meets a stranger who takes over her life. Thriller, starring Ashley Greene, Brooke Lyons and Tom Felton. Directed by Joel David Moore, better known as one of the stars of the Avatar films Joel David Moore - Director Amanda Crew - Eve Carver Tom Felton - Peter Carver Ashley Greene - Renata Brooke Lyons - Chelsea Ranza Rick Fox - Salvador Ranza.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-April 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
programme.desc: The first part of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy based on the book by JRR Tolkien, starring Martin Freeman and Ian McKellen. Encouraged by the wizard Gandalf, Bilbo Baggins leaves the comfort of his home in the Shire to join a band of dwarves in their quest to reclaim the Kingdom of Erebor from the dragon Smaug. It is a journey that will see the plucky hobbit encounter goblins, orcs and a very strange creature called Gollum Peter Jackson - Director Ian McKellen - Gandalf the Grey Martin Freeman - Bilbo Baggins Richard Armitage - Thorin Oakenshield James Nesbitt - Bofur Ken Stott - Balin Sylvester McCoy - Radagast Barry Humphries - Great Goblin Cate Blanchett - Galadriel Ian Holm - Old Bilbo Christopher Lee - Saruman Hugo Weaving - Lord Elrond Elijah Wood - Frodo Andy Serkis - Gollum Aidan Turner - Kili Lee Pace - Thranduil Benedict Cumberbatch - Necromancer Graham McTavish - Dwalin Dean O'Gorman - Fili Stephen Hunter (3) - Bombur Adam Brown - Ori.

Encouraged by the wizard Gandalf, Bilbo Baggins leaves the comfort of his home in the Shire to join a band of dwarves in their quest to reclaim the Kingdom of Erebor from the dragon Smaug. programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A children's football team competes in a world championship, but one member is left off the field to look after the canine mascot. When an evil plot emerges to sabotage the tournament, the quick-witted dog assembles the other mascots into a team to foil the villains responsible. programme.title: A Tiger's Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creature's mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tiger's Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. Drama, starring Sunny Pawar, Claudia Gerini and Amandeep Singh Brando Quilici - Director Claudia Gerini - Miss Hannah Sunny Pawar - Balmani Yoon C Joyce - Samchai Amandeep Singh - Jenan.

programme.title: Mee-Shee: the Water Giant
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Action, Family, Children's ║ 2005 ║ PG
programme.desc: A boy is far from happy when his oil executive father cancels their planned holiday to go on a salvage mission at a remote Canadian lake. programme.title: Golda

Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: Small business owner Hope Goldman performs facials to celebrity clientele and powerful businesswomen. She is poised to launch her own skincare line, but is in arrears with rent on her store at a shopping complex. A rival called Angel opens in close proximity and soon after, her email is hacked and tyres slashed. Hope is convinced that Angel is the culprit and enlists hired thug Armen and young beau Jordan to extinguish the competition. programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: A teenager strives to be a good daughter, a good friend and a good student - all while navigating an endless barrage of invasive, obsessive thoughts that she cannot control. programme.title: Maine Pyar Kiya

programme.title: Dabangg 3

programme.title: Hum Aapke Hain Kaun
programme.desc: (Movies @6) Upon the death of her sister, Nisha's wedding is fixed with brother-in-law Rajesh. But Nisha and Prem, Rajesh's brother are in love.

programme.title: Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan
programme.desc: Friends navigate futuristic world, finding themselves and resilience.

programme.title: Trimurti
programme.desc: One of Kalyani's sons, Nandu, is arrested and she pleads to Jagannath for his release. When Jagannath is killed, Nandu is suspected.

programme.title: Shirdi Ke Sai Baba
programme.desc: Dive into the inspiring life and miracles of the beloved Shirdi saint. Discover his teachings, compassion, and the profound impact he had on countless lives.

programme.title: Chori Chori Chupke Chupke

programme.title: Gunashekhar Shankuntalam

programme.desc: Rakhee Gulzar, Parikshat Sahni.

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: Small business owner Hope Goldman performs facials to celebrity clientele and powerful businesswomen. She is poised to launch her own skincare line, but is in arrears with rent on her store at a shopping complex. A rival called Angel opens in close proximity and soon after, her email is hacked and tyres slashed. Hope is convinced that Angel is the culprit and enlists hired thug Armen and young beau Jordan to extinguish the competition. programme.title: Coming 2 America
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Romance, Drama, Music, Arts And Culture, Musical ║ 2021 ║ 12A
programme.desc: As King Jaffe Joffer, ruler of the prosperous nation of Zamunda, takes his final breath, pampered crown prince Akeem faces a constitutional crisis without a male heir to ascend the throne. programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ PG
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: Small business owner Hope Goldman performs facials to celebrity clientele and powerful businesswomen. She is poised to launch her own skincare line, but is in arrears with rent on her store at a shopping complex. A rival called Angel opens in close proximity and soon after, her email is hacked and tyres slashed. Hope is convinced that Angel is the culprit and enlists hired thug Armen and young beau Jordan to extinguish the competition. programme.title: PL Retro: Arsenal v Tottenham 2008
programme.desc: Relive on the greatest north London derbies of all time as Arsenal take on Tottenham Hotspur at the Emirates Stadium back in the 2008-09 season in a game with a remarkable conclusion.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Coventry/Man Utd 1997
programme.desc: A look at the greatest Premier League game for each club, as voted for by fans. Here, for Coventry City, the stunning late comeback 3-2 win over Manchester United back in December 1997.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Everton/Wimbledon 1994
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Everton, the 3-2 win over Wimbledon in 1994 that ensured the Toffees' survival.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man City/Fulham 2008
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Fulham, the 3-2 fightback at Man City in 2008 that ignited their survival run.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Arsenal/Hull '08
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Hull City, the famous 2-1 away win at Arsenal back in September 2008.

programme.title: Best Premier League Goals 93/94
programme.desc: Sky Sports takes a look at some of the best goals from Premier League seasons in years gone by. Here, a look at some of the stunning goals from the 93-94 season.

programme.title: Best PL Goals: Chelsea v Arsenal
programme.desc: Enjoy some of the finest goals from matches between London rivals Chelsea and Arsenal.

programme.title: PL 100 Club: Thierry Henry
programme.desc: A celebration of some of the finest goalscorers in Premier League history. This episode features the best of Thierry Henry's 175 top-flight goals.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Ipswich/Man Utd 1994
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Ipswich Town, the 3-2 win over Manchester United in September 1994.

programme.title: PL Greatest: M'boro/Man City 2008
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 49 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Middlesbrough, the 8-1 hammering of Man City back in May 2008.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Newcastle/Man Utd 1996
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic game from the Premier League. Here, Newcastle United enjoy a memorable afternoon at St James' Park as they rip apart Man Utd in a 5-0 destruction.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man Utd/Norwich 2015
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Norwich City, the 2-1 win over Manchester United in December 2015.

programme.title: PL Legends: Zola
programme.desc: Series profiling some of the greatest players to grace the Premier League. Here the focus is on former Chelsea forward Gianfranco Zola.

programme.title: PL Legends: Neville
programme.desc: Series profiling some of the greatest players to grace the Premier League. Here the focus is on former Manchester United full-back Gary Neville.

programme.title: Best PL Goals: Man Utd v Everton
programme.desc: Enjoy some of the finest Premier League goals from past meetings between Manchester United and Everton.

programme.title: Best PL Goals: Newcastle/Liverpool
programme.desc: Enjoy some of the best Premier League goals from past meetings between Newcastle United and Liverpool.

programme.title: PL 100 Club: Alan Shearer
programme.desc: A celebration of some of the finest goalscorers in Premier League history. This episode features the best of Alan Shearer's 260 top-flight goals. Tweet your favourite #pl100club.

programme.title: PL 100 Club: Jamie Vardy
programme.desc: A look back at the goals of the players who have found the net over 100 times in the Premier League. This episode focuses on Leicester City star Jamie Vardy.

programme.title: The Football Show
programme.desc: A detailed look at all the major stories making the football headlines this morning, with discussion and analysis of the big talking points.

programme.desc: A detailed look at all the major stories making the football headlines this morning, with discussion and analysis of the big talking points.

programme.title: Lunchtime Live
programme.desc: Sit down with Sky Sports News as the team break down all the sports stories making the headlines this lunchtime.

programme.title: PL Years: Man Utd's Treble
programme.desc: Take a look back at all the most memorable moments from the 1998-99 campaign. It was a season to savour for Manchester United as they took home the treble.

programme.title: PL Retro: Man Utd v Liverpool 2009
programme.desc: Manchester United welcome Liverpool to Old Trafford in this classic Premier League match from the 2008-09 campaign. It would prove to be a memorable afternoon for the visiting side.

programme.title: Best Premier League Goals 94/95
programme.desc: Sky Sports takes a look at some of the best goals from Premier League seasons in years gone by. Here, a look at some cracking goals from the 94-95 season.

programme.title: PL 100: Petr Cech
programme.desc: PL100 returns for a new series. In the first episode we sit down with Czech goalkeeper Petr Cech who kept 202 clean sheets in 443 performances in the English Premier League.

programme.title: PL 100: Paul Scholes
programme.desc: In this episode of PL100, we sit down with ex-Manchester United midfielder Paul Scholes who scored 107 goals in 499 performances in the Premier League.

programme.title: Transfer 360: Nemanja Vidic
programme.desc: The inside story of Nemanja Vidic's move to Manchester United. Hear from Vidic as well as Edwin van der Sar and Patrice Evra on how one of the greatest defenders started his journey.

programme.title: Transfer 360: Sol Campbell
programme.desc: Find out the inside story of Sol Campbell's move from Spurs to Arsenal, as David Dein, Lord Sugar and Campbell detail how one of the Premier League's most controversial transfers unfolded.

programme.title: Gary Neville's Soccerbox: Scholes
programme.desc: Gary Neville sits down with former teammate Paul Scholes to discuss their time in the game and some of the most notable matches in which they played.

programme.title: Gary Neville's Soccerbox: Fowler
programme.desc: Gary Neville sits down with former Liverpool striker Robbie Fowler to discuss their time in the game and some of the most notable matches in which they played.

programme.title: Transfer 360: Juninho
programme.desc: Find out the inside story of Juninho's move to Middlesbrough. Hear from Bryan Robson, ex-teammates and Juninho himself on how a Brazilian star ended up signing for a newly promoted club.

programme.title: Transfer 360: Jurgen Klinsmann
programme.desc: Find out the inside story of Jurgen Klinsmann's move to Spurs. Hear from Ossie Ardiles, Lord Sugar and Klinsmann himself on how his reputation changed, taking the Premier League by storm.

programme.title: PL Icons: Dennis Bergkamp
programme.desc: A look at one of the most iconic players to have graced the Premier League. Here, the focus is on the highly skilled Arsenal legend Dennis Bergkamp.

programme.title: PL Icons: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer
programme.desc: A look at one of the most iconic players to have graced the Premier League. Here, the focus is on former Man United forward Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.

programme.title: Premier League Years 1999/00
programme.desc: Take a look back at all the most memorable moments from the 1999-2000 season. Alex Ferguson's Red Devils were the team everybody feared.
